attributes.action: Stop any more building on the agricultural and countryside we have left.
attributes.additional_details:
The government and authorities has also caused divisions with small communities where there were a small village and they were close. But the developers came in started to build all around then they weren’t close any more!
We must preserve the countryside for future generations as we know in a few years time it will be gone too much is disappearing before our eyes we must not let this happen!

I am calling on the government to make change and build bridges with all the electorates and constituency to stop any more building! We do have enough houses!
attributes.background: For decades we have seen an increase in our Greenland being destroyed. Also our wildlife is disappearing and this is a issue close to my heart as I feel like many others that in a few years we won’t have any land left or green. There are plenty of brownfield sites where they can construct on!
